headline: Is There Opportunity in Gartner After a 50% Drop in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Gartner is undervalued or if there is an opportunity ready for the taking? You are not alone, especially with so much debate around where the real fair value lies. The stock has seen quite a ride, dropping 5.1% this past week and sliding 7.5% over the past month, with a substantial year-to-date decline of 50.9%. Recent headlines have amplified investor curiosity as broader technology sector volatility and shifting market expectations have put pressure on research and consulting...

headline: Gartner (IT): Margin Decline Undermines Bull Narratives Despite Strong Historic Earnings Growth
summary: Gartner (IT) posted a net profit margin of 13.7%, a decrease from last year’s 17.3%, signaling a dip in profitability. Despite a solid five-year earnings growth rate of 19.8% per year, the company faced negative earnings growth over the past twelve months and both projected revenue and earnings growth lag behind the broader US market. However, with a price-to-earnings ratio of 19.3x, well below industry and peer averages, and a share price trading at $237.12 compared to an estimated fair...
